channel.title: [639 Dementhium] Checking items
channel.description:
What checks the players inventory for an item?
Like this [code]player.getEquipment().getContainer().get(Equipment.SLOT_HAT).getId() == Talisman.COSMIC_TALISMAN.getTiaraId())[/code]
Except items in there inventory
EDIT: Found
